item.title: Boris FX Optics
item.description: Optics is the definitive digital toolbox meant to simulate - optical camera filters, - specialized lenses, - film stocks and grain, - lens flares, - optical lab processes, - color correction - as well as natural light and photographic effects. Coupon 25% off permanent licenses and subscription options. Use coupon code: optics25 VIDEOS Introducing Boris FX Optics - Visual Effects for Photographers Boris FX Optics: Quick Start Guide Optics: How to Create EZ Masks Optics: How to Add Lens Flares in Photoshop Optics: How to Add Light Effects in Photoshop Replay: The Tricks to Great Images with Optics User Guides Optics 2021 Standalone Optics 2021 PhotoPlugIn
